message: I'll take 99.9% and leave you with 0.1% for now.  Let's see if you're a good sport.
I'll take 90% and leave you with 10%. This is a fair starting point. Let's work together and avoid ending up with nothing!
Okay, I'm willing to give you more. But I need a bigger share to make this worth my while with the inflation. Let's be reasonable here.
Let's meet in the middle.  I'm willing to give up some of my share for a more even split.  We both need to be reasonable to avoid losing everything.
